Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and partially grey-black in section, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of one line of incised Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394324) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394324)
